levels.title: Awakening
levels.story: You wake up in a dark digital void. A faint green text appears: 'SYSTEM INITIALIZATION... LOCATION UNKNOWN'
levels.hint: Try the 'pwd' command to see your current location
levels.response:
/home/user/matrix/level1

You are in the Matrix. The only way out is to master the terminal.

levels.title: Exploration
levels.story: Green text flickers: 'MULTIPLE DIRECTORIES DETECTED. SCAN RECOMMENDED.'
levels.hint: Use 'ls' to list contents of the current directory
levels.response:
README.txt
tools/
escapes/
secrets/

You see several directories. One might hold the key to escape.

levels.title: The First Step
levels.story: You need to explore deeper. The escape/ directory seems promising...
levels.hint: Use 'cd' followed by the directory name
levels.response:
You enter the escapes directory. The air feels different here.

Type 'pwd' to confirm your location.

levels.title: Creating Reality
levels.story: To escape, you need to build your own exit. Start by creating a directory.
levels.hint: Use 'mkdir' to make a new directory
levels.response:
Directory created. You feel the Matrix bending to your will.

The power of creation is yours.

levels.title: The Git Awakening
levels.story: A message appears: 'VERSION CONTROL IS THE KEY TO REALITY MANIPULATION'
levels.hint: Use 'git init' to start version control
levels.response:
Initialized empty Git repository in /home/user/matrix/escapes/my-escape/.git/

You've created a new timeline. Possibilities are endless.

levels.title: Documenting Reality
levels.story: Every escape needs a plan. Create a file to document your journey.
levels.hint: Use 'touch' to create an empty file
levels.response:
File created. Your escape plan begins to take shape.

Type 'ls' to verify it exists.

levels.title: The Staging Area
levels.story: Before changes persist, they must be staged. This is the Matrix's first law.
levels.objective: Add your escape plan to the staging area
levels.hint: Use 'git add' followed by the filename
levels.response:
File staged. Your changes are tracked but not yet permanent.

One more step remains.

levels.title: Making It Real
levels.story: Commit your changes. Make them permanent in the timeline.
levels.objective: Commit with message 'My first step to freedom'
levels.command: git commit -m "My first step to freedom"
levels.hint: Use 'git commit -m' followed by your message in quotes
levels.response:
[master (root-commit) a3f5b7c] My first step to freedom
 1 file changed, 0 insertions(+), 0 deletions(-)

Your reality is now permanent. The Matrix recognizes your will.

levels.title: Branching Realities
levels.story: True power comes from creating alternate timelines. Branch your reality.
levels.hint: Use 'git checkout -b' followed by the branch name
levels.response:
Switched to a new branch 'escape-route'

You've created a parallel reality. The exit is near.

levels.title: THE FINAL COMMAND
levels.story:
One command remains. The ultimate command that grants true freedom.

Type it carefully. This is your escape.
levels.hint: You need superuser privileges to exit the Matrix itself...
